participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.background: i am an animal activist. the holidays make me depressed. my age is too old to say. i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i am a piano teacher on the side. i play several instruments.

content.text: Alright mate? i like to watch tv and eat my favorite food
